013package org.apache.juneau.oapi;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.oapi.annotation.*;
017
018/**
019 * Metadata on classes specific to the OpenApi serializers and parsers pulled from the {@link OpenApi @OpenApi} annotation on
020 * the class.
021 *
022 * <ul class='seealso'>
023 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.OpenApiDetails">OpenAPI Details</a>
024
025 * </ul>
026 */
027public class OpenApiClassMeta extends ExtendedClassMeta {
028
029   /**
030    * Constructor.
031    *
032    * @param cm The class that this annotation is defined on.
033    * @param mp OpenApi metadata provider (for finding information about other artifacts).
034    */
035   public OpenApiClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm, OpenApiMetaProvider mp) {
036      super(cm);
037   }
038}
